trans-unit.source: Files you've previously accessed will show up here
trans-unit.target: Bestanden en mappen die je eerder hebt gebruikt worden hier weergeven

trans-unit.source: Send the developers an issue report with detailed information
trans-unit.target: Stuur de ontwikkelaars een probleemrapport met gedetailleerde informatie
Verder gaan waar je bent gebleven

trans-unit.source: Open a specific page or pages

To get started, you'll need to grant us permission to display your files. This will open a Settings page where you can grant us this permission. You'll need to reopen the app once you've completed this step.
trans-unit.target: Bij het starten van een item uit de jumplist
Deze actie kan niet voltooid worden

trans-unit.source: is a subfolder of the source folder
trans-unit.target: is een submap van de bronmap

trans-unit.source: An item with this name already exists in this directory.
trans-unit.target: Een item met die naam bestaat al in deze map.

trans-unit.source: We weren't able to delete this item
trans-unit.target: We konden dit item niet verwijderen

trans-unit.source: Please insert the necessary drive to access this item.
trans-unit.target: Plaats het benodigde station om toegang te krijgen tot dit item.

trans-unit.source: The file you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: Het bestand dat u probeert te openen, is mogelijk verplaatst of verwijderd.

trans-unit.source: The file you are attempting to preview may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: De bestanden waarvan u een voorbeeld probeert te bekijken, zijn mogelijk verplaatst of verwijderd.

trans-unit.source: The folder you are attempting to access may have been moved or deleted.
trans-unit.target: De map die u probeert te openen, is mogelijk verplaatst of verwijderd.

trans-unit.source: The file you're trying to delete is currently being used by an another application.
trans-unit.target: Het bestand dat u probeert te verwijderen, wordt momenteel gebruikt door een andere toepassing.

trans-unit.source: The requested operation is not supported
trans-unit.target: De gevraagde bewerking wordt niet ondersteund.

trans-unit.source: The item name must not contain the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: De itemnaam mag de volgende tekens niet bevatten: \ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.source: The item name must not contain the following characters: \ / : * ? " < > |
trans-unit.target: De itemnaam mag de volgende tekens niet bevatten: \ / : * ? " < > |

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to permanently delete all these items?
trans-unit.target: Weet je zeker dat je alle item wilt verwijderen?

trans-unit.note: kB for 1000 bytes, KB for 1024 bytes

trans-unit.source: Enter password to unlock the drive
trans-unit.target: Voer het wachtwoord in om de schijf te ontgrendelen

trans-unit.source: Please check the password and try again.
trans-unit.target: Controleer het wachtwoord en probeer het opnieuw.

trans-unit.source: When opening a folder in Files
trans-unit.target: Bij het starten van een item uit de jumplist

trans-unit.source: Open folder in a new tab
trans-unit.target: Open map in een nieuw tabblad

trans-unit.source: Can't access any items to display
trans-unit.target: Geen toegang tot items om weer te geven

trans-unit.source: The source and destination file names are the same.
trans-unit.target: De namen van bron- en bestemmingsbestanden zijn hetzelfde.

trans-unit.source: The destination folder is the same as the source folder.
trans-unit.target: De bestemmingsmap is hetzelfde als de bronmap.

trans-unit.source: Files ran into a problem that the developers didn't prepare for yet.
trans-unit.target: Files ran into a problem that the developers didn't prepare for yet.
Bekijk wie heeft bijgedragen aan Files

trans-unit.source: Find out what's new in Files
trans-unit.target: Ontdek wat er nieuw is in Files

trans-unit.source: The item referenced is either invalid or inaccessible.{0}Error message:{0}{1}
trans-unit.target: Het item waarnaar wordt verwezen, is ongeldig of niet toegankelijk. {0} Foutmelding: {0} {1}

trans-unit.source: There's nothing to share right now...
trans-unit.target: Er valt op dit moment niets te delen...

trans-unit.source: The items you've selected will be shared
The selected item will be shared
The item you're attempting to rename no longer exists. Please verify the correct location of the item you need to rename.
trans-unit.target: Het item dat je wilt hernoemen bestaat niet meer. Controleer de locatie van dit item.

trans-unit.source: The name specified was invalid. Please check the desired item name and try again.
trans-unit.target: The name specified was invalid. Please check the desired item name and try again.

trans-unit.source: The length of the item name specified exceeds the maximum limit. Please check the desired name and try again.
trans-unit.target: The length of the item name specified exceeds the maximum limit. Please check the desired name and try again.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete this item?
trans-unit.target: Weet je zeker dat je dit item wilt verwijderen?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to delete these {0} items?
trans-unit.target: Weet je zeker dat je deze {0} items wilt verwijderen?

trans-unit.source: Selects the best multitasking control based on how the app window is resized. When the window is small, you'll notice the horizontal tab strip is collapsed into a flyout on the navigation toolbar.
trans-unit.target: Selects the best multitasking control based on how the app window is resized. When the window is small, you'll notice the horizontal tab strip is collapsed into a flyout on the navigation toolbar.

trans-unit.source: Always hides the vertical multitasking flyout from the navigation toolbar, and shows the traditional horizontal tabstrip on the app window. This is suited for users who need to keep track of every open app instance at all times.
trans-unit.target: Always hides the vertical multitasking flyout from the navigation toolbar, and shows the traditional horizontal tabstrip on the app window. This is suited for users who need to keep track of every open app instance at all times.

trans-unit.source: Collapses the horizontal list of app instances into a vertical flyout on the navigation toolbar, designed for users who want a clean app interface with on-demand access to a multitasking experience.
trans-unit.target: Collapses the horizontal list of app instances into a vertical flyout on the navigation toolbar, designed for users who want a clean app interface with on-demand access to a multitasking experience.

trans-unit.source: The application needs to be restarted in order to apply the language setting, would you like to restart the app?
trans-unit.target: The application needs to be restarted in order to apply the language setting, would you like to restart the app?

trans-unit.source: Enable multiselect options (currently only available in the tiles and grid view layout modes)
If you change a file extension, the file might become unusable. Are you sure you want to change it?
trans-unit.target: Als je de bestandsextensie wijzigt, zou het bestand onbruikbaar kunnen worden. Weet je zeker dat je het wilt veranderen?

trans-unit.source: Preemptive cache parallel limit (smaller numbers should work better for hard drives)
trans-unit.target: Preemptive cache parallel limit (smaller numbers should work better for hard drives)

trans-unit.target: Use preemptive cache (preload entries in child directories on navigation)
